channel.title: Casa Bonita
channel.description:
Has anyone been to this magnificent and awesome restaurant? If you have please share your experience to it and enlighten others to go to it.
Every year I go to Casa Bonita with my family. The food there is nothing to be so excited about, it's all about the entertainment. It is a place of Ah's and wonders. Inside the restaurant they have the best entertainment. Included are flame jugglers, gold and silver mines, cliff divers, caves, strolling mariachis, an arcade, live shows, and a wonderful staff, PLUS an endless supply of their world famous sopaipillas. In the upcoming years I will be moving to Denver for college and I'm going to apply to be one of the cliff divers.
Here are some pictures of the place: ![](upload://ghnMADAZexoSp0xm227JwGmGFEj.jpeg) Even Cartman loves Casa Bonita [img]https://blogs.westword.com/latestword/Casa_Bonita.jpg[/img] ![](upload://g8cjyeIMQVw6u96zQDnwfuknbBY.jpeg) [img]https://media.collegepublisher.com/media/paper538/stills/w04g0b12.jpg[/img]
Now please share:

item.title: Casa Bonita
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Grum:

If I were you, I wouldn’t want a bunch of annoying forum members attending my kids fifth b-day. They’d probably intervene in the middle of it all and bombard you with questions about the mod.

shucks… no one wants to meet me. I am an old lady who is often misinterpreted as a cougar wanting a smidgen of sugar. All resist an actual approach to me. :s hrug: Heck… I have yet to meet the developer of the beloved “dam” screen shot even though he lives about 5 minutes from my home. Of course, it could be he simply is a busy man. No matter. All is gold. :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Casa Bonita
item.dc:creator: Rossman
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

oh shut up you.

have fun at coors and be sure to take advantage of all the ‘samples’ at the end of the tour. And while at the game, be sure to notice the rockpile. It is concidered the party area in most cases.

Im gonna be in the rockpile tonight so it will be fun. Coors was fun I got a Molsen canadian glass so im happy

Read full topic

item.description:
CatzEyes93:

Aug 10th 7pm… we are gonna be there to celebrate my youngest’s 5 year birthday. Be there or be square forumites!~

If I were you, I wouldn’t want a bunch of annoying forum members attending my kids fifth b-day. They’d probably intervene in the middle of it all and bombard you with questions about the mod.

item.title: Casa Bonita

item.description:
The Rockies? We whooped yer ass in the world series two years back.

Read full topic

item.title: Casa Bonita
item.dc:creator: Rossman
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

Aw man! I missed you! We might have been able to meet up for sopopillas (or however you spell it)

And my apologies if I wasnt convincing. It really is a good place to go to take in the ambiance and unusual set up. It just is not normally a place you go more than once… unless there are kids involved that have never been.

Speaking of which, I think my soon to be 5 year old has not been there. hm.

Lol damn well today we’re going to the Coors factory and the Rockies game tonight.

Read full topic

item.title: Casa Bonita
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Rossman:

I’m acctually going tonight! :3
Just got into Denver, so I’m gonna party! :awesome:

Aw man! I missed you! We might have been able to meet up for sopopillas (or however you spell it)

And my apologies if I wasnt convincing. It really is a good place to go to take in the ambiance and unusual set up. It just is not normally a place you go more than once… unless there are kids involved that have never been.

Speaking of which, I think my soon to be 5 year old has not been there. hm.

item.description:

EDIT: Oh! sorry… Um… yes… it is awesome. Anyone visiting the denver area should check it out. =-D

Very convincing.
I’ve never been to Denver, but I’ll keep it in mind.

Read full topic

item.title: Casa Bonita
item.dc:creator: Rossman
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

I can bike ride to the place it is so close to my home.

Food is ok, but this is not a place that you go to eat the wonderful food. It is a place that is for discovering the nook and cranny areas of gift shops, arcade games and various cutesy entertainment.

The sopapieas are very good like you said, but the fact that you take your plate of food off an assembly line is really what kills it for me.

https://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&um=1&ie=UTF-8&q=casa+bonita&near=Denver,+CO&fb=1&split=1&gl=us&cid=0,0,17958615822093298505&ei=5oFkSrrxBYaOtAPTs5ln&sa=X&oi=local_result&ct=image&resnum=1

EDIT: Oh! sorry… Um… yes… it is awesome. Anyone visiting the denver area should check it out. =-D

I’m acctually going tonight! :3
Just got into Denver, so I’m gonna party! :awesome:

Read full topic
